title: Tokyo-Based Investment Firm Metaplanet Continues to Buy Bitcoin Aggressively! Here Are the Details
body: Tokyo-based investment firm Metaplanet has deepened its commitment to Bitcoin by purchasing an additional 160 BTC for $13.3 million, just one day after its largest purchase to date. Metaplanet Expands Bitcoin Presence with $13 Million Purchase, Now Holds 4,206 BTC The company, which is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange, announced today that it purchased BTCs at an average price of $83,264 per coin, bringing its total assets, worth approximately $359.8 million at the time of the purchase, to 4,206 BTC. This purchase follows Tuesday’s announcement that the firm purchased 696 BTC, marking its most aggressive accumulation to date. Since announcing its Bitcoin accumulation strategy in April 2024, Metaplanet has rapidly expanded its holdings and is now the ninth-largest public institutional Bitcoin holder worldwide and the largest in Asia, according to data from BitcoinTreasuries.net. The company has set an ambitious target of 10,000 BTC by the end of 2025 and aims to double that to 21,000 BTC by the end of 2026. Despite the aggressive Bitcoin accumulation, Metaplanet's shares fell 0.98% in morning trading on Wednesday, while Japan's Nikkei 225 index was flat. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Tokyo-Based Investment Firm Metaplanet Continues to Buy Bitcoin Aggressively! Here Are the Details

title: XRP’s Fate Hangs in Balance Ahead of SEC’s April 3 Meeting
body: XRP remains caught in a consolidation phase as the market closely watches an upcoming SEC meeting scheduled for April 3. Speculation over whether the regulatory body will vote to withdraw its appeal has left traders uncertain, contributing to heightened selling pressure. This uncertainty, combined with broader market corrections, has made XRP vulnerable to further declines. XRP’s Battle with Resistance and Market Pressures Following recent price fluctuations, XRP has struggled to maintain its footing above key support levels. After breaking past the $2.20 threshold earlier in the week, the token slipped back to $2.10, indicating a lack of strong buying momentum. If the SEC’s decision is delayed or if concerns persist, XRP risks falling below the critical $2 mark. As of now, XRP commands a market capitalization of $122.3 billion. However, it remains significantly below its all-time high of $3.84, hovering within a tight trading range of $2.05 to $2.50. Market sentiment suggests that bearish forces could soon push the token toward an even deeper correction. Indicators Point to Mounting Bearish Momentum A series of technical indicators reinforces the notion that XRP is currently facing strong downward pressure . The Relative Strength Index (RSI) sits at 39, reflecting weak momentum well below the neutral 50 threshold. Meanwhile, the Commodity Channel Index (CCI) has plunged to -182.70, signaling that the asset is deep in oversold territory. Further confirming the bearish bias, the Stochastic Oscillator is at a concerning 11.67%, highlighting a lack of strong buying activity. The Awesome Oscillator, which remains in negative territory at -0.13, underscores the growing dominance of sellers in the market. Additionally, the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) indicator prints a negative reading of -0.06, reinforcing the bearish outlook. The Momentum Indicator holds steady at -0.31, further suggesting that downward pressure is unlikely to ease in the near term. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 The Risk of a Larger Decline Given the overwhelming bearish sentiment, XRP faces the risk of a major downturn if it fails to hold key support levels. A drop below $2 could trigger a cascade of panic selling, potentially pushing the asset down to $1.80 or lower. Unless bullish traders step in to provide support, the most probable direction remains downward, with technical indicators offering little hope for a swift recovery. External Market Factors Could Exacerbate Volatility Beyond XRP-specific concerns, broader macroeconomic uncertainties are also weighing on the crypto market. Recession fears, labor market instability in the United States, and ongoing trade policy developments have all contributed to the volatility seen in recent weeks. However, for XRP, much depends on the outcome of the SEC’s decision regarding its appeal. If regulators opt to withdraw the case against Ripple, the market could see a significant shift in sentiment, potentially providing the token with a much-needed boost. Until then, traders remain on edge, watching for any developments that could influence XRP’s next major move. title: Can Pepe Coin Price Surge 130% As Whales Buy 492B PEPE Ahead of Falling Wedge Breakout?
body: Pepe Coin (PEPE), a popular meme-based cryptocurrency, has dropped 15% in the last week, reflecting broader market fluctuations. Despite these losses, the PEPE price remains above the $0.0000074 support level, signaling possible resilience. Analysts suggest that after testing a falling wedge pattern, the meme coin could experience a surge, potentially increasing by 130-140% if the market stabilizes. Is 130%-140% Price Surge Possible for Pepe Coin Price After Falling Wedge Breakout? The Pepe Coin price is currently experiencing a slight correction while testing a critical resistance level within a falling wedge pattern. This technical setup suggests that the token may be on the verge of a breakout. Analysts are closely watching for any signs of a significant move as the token approaches this key resistance zone. A breakout from this pattern could potentially trigger a bullish wave, with estimates indicating a price surge of 130% to 140% in the midterm. This setup has caught the attention of many analysts in the crypto space, offering an exciting opportunity for those tracking the PEPE price action. The outcome will depend on whether the token can maintain its momentum and successfully break through the resistance in the coming days. Whale Purchase of 492B PEPE Sparks Surge The whale transaction witnessed in the crypto market on April 1, 2025, marks a significant event as a fresh wallet acquired a staggering 492 billion PEPE tokens valued at $3.74 million. This move sent ripples through the community, drawing attention to the sudden surge in demand for the token. As the market absorbs this large buy order, the value of PEPE may experience upward pressure. However, the effect will depend on whether this whale continues to accumulate or if other traders follow suit. A fresh wallet just bought 492B $PEPE worth $3.74M. pic.twitter.com/dRpHOP5V3G — Plazma (@Plazma0x) April 1, 2025 PEPE Price Shows Signs of Rally: Key Resistance Levels to Watch The latest PEPE price analysis shows that the cryptocurrency has been facing a decline. Currently, the price of PEPE is at $0.000000746, marking a decrease of about 3% in the past 24 hours. The crypto market is still fluctuating, with bulls and bears struggling to control. The BTC price is currently hovering above $85,k and the ETH price is currently above $1,850, with slight market movement. The Pepe coin price has experienced a significant drop, but the price is finding support near the $0.000000700 level. A reversal could occur if it breaks through key resistance levels, specifically at $0.000001 and $0.0000015. These levels act as potential milestones for a rebound. The Awesome Oscillator (AO) shows a positive momentum shift, while the MACD indicator indicates some bullish movement in the short term. The moving averages gradually converge, which could signal an upward trend. Source: TradingView If the Pepe coin price prediction can maintain its momentum and break through resistance, it could reach $0.000002 in the near future, which represents an upside of approximately 161% from the current price. title: Top Analyst Says Ethereum Price is ‘Extremely Undervalued’ as ETH Flips Solana in Key Metric
body: A top crypto market analyst has stated that Ethereum is “extremely undervalued” after recording four consecutive months of negative returns. This prediction comes after the Ethereum network flipped Solana in a key metric, signaling a possible trend reversal. Ethereum Flips Solana in Key Network Metric The Ethereum network has been lagging behind Solana in terms of decentralized exchange (DEX) volumes for the last six months. However, Ethereum has now reclaimed its top position as the king of DeFi. Data from DeFiLlama shows that Ethereum has attained monthly DEX volumes of $64 billion, which is higher than Solana’s $52 billion in volumes. The data further shows that Solana has been topping this metric since October. DEX Volumes The main reason why Ethereum has retaken the top spot is because of fading meme coin activity on Solana. Despite diversification attempts by PumpFun , the ongoing market turmoil has hampered speculative trading activity that is rampant with meme coins. Top Analyst Says Ethereum Price Is Extremely Undervalued According to top crypto market analyst Crypto Rover, Ethereum price shows signs of being “extremely overvalued.” In his Ethereum price prediction , the analyst observed that ETH had posted four consecutive red months. This scenario was last seen during the 2018 bear market before a strong upward breakout. Ethereum Price Chart If ETH is indeed undervalued, it suggests that the recent dip may have pushed the altcoin to a local bottom. This might precede a strong move to the upside. However, despite the analyst’s positive forecast for Ethereum price, ETH is facing intense selling pressure. A recent Coingape article reported that since February 25, Ethereum whales have sold more than 760,000 tokens. At the same time, ETH ETF inflows from SoSoValue show intense selling by institutions. Ethereum Technical Analysis as Q2 Hints at 60% Gains Coinglass data shows that Q2 has been the second-best performing quarter for Ethereum price. The altcoin records average returns of 60% during the quarter, and if history rhymes, ETH could surge past $3,000. On the shorter 4-hour time frame chart, Ethereum price has formed a rounding bottom pattern, which might precede a reversal of the trend from bearish to bullish. The height of this rounding bottom suggests that ETH can record a 7.96% price rally from its current price and reach $2,062. Breaking the $2,000 psychological barrier is bullish for Ethereum, and could spark the beginning of a positive quarter for this altcoin. The RSI has risen to 50, which is a neutral level where both buyers and sellers are battling for control. Meanwhile, the AO bars have flipped to the positive side, a sign that the underlying momentum is now bullish. ETH/USD: 4-Hour Chart To sum up, Ethereum is flashing positive signals, which suggest that the price might soon soar past the $2,000 psychological barrier. With analysts predicting that ETH may be extremely undervalued and network activity rising, the altcoin might be on the verge of a trend reversal. The post Top Analyst Says Ethereum Price is ‘Extremely Undervalued’ as ETH Flips Solana in Key Metric appeared first on CoinGape .

title: GameStop and Tether Bet Big on Bitcoin in Treasury Shake-Up
body: Two major players from vastly different industries — video game retailer GameStop and stablecoin issuer Tether — have made significant Bitcoin acquisitions in the first quarter of 2025, signaling a growing trend among companies to diversify their balance sheets with digital assets. GameStop announced the completion of a $1.5 billion private offering of convertible notes to fund its Bitcoin purchases, while Tether acquired 8,888 Bitcoin worth approximately $750 million, increasing its total holdings to over $8.4 billion. Both moves come amid ongoing regulatory discussions and market debate over the role of Bitcoin in corporate treasury strategies. GameStop Raises $1.5 Billion to Buy Bitcoin, Signaling Bold Treasury Strategy Shift Video game retailer GameStop has officially closed its highly anticipated $1.5 billion private offering of convertible notes, revealing in a regulatory filing that it plans to deploy the capital toward acquiring Bitcoin. The move marks a significant strategic pivot for the company, which has long been at the center of meme-stock culture and retail investor speculation. In a filing submitted to the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on Tuesday, GameStop confirmed the completion of its private offering of 0.00% convertible senior notes due 2030. The offering included the full exercise of the initial purchaser’s option to buy an additional $200 million in notes, raising the total proceeds to $1.5 billion. The company stated explicitly that the funds will be used to add Bitcoin to its balance sheet, drawing a clear parallel to the playbook employed by business intelligence firm Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy) in 2020, when it became one of the first publicly traded companies to make large-scale Bitcoin purchases as part of its treasury strategy. A Bold But Polarizing Move GameStop’s announcement initially fueled a brief rally in its stock price last week as crypto and equity markets reacted to the news. However, the rally was short-lived. Shares of the company have since pulled back, suggesting a growing skepticism among investors and analysts about the long-term viability and prudence of tying the retailer's treasury strategy to a volatile digital asset. GameStop stock price (Source: Google Finance ) The decision comes at a time when GameStop is sitting on over $4 billion in cash reserves and has reported $3.8 billion in revenue in 2024, according to its latest financial disclosures. This strong balance sheet could provide the company with enough financial cushion to absorb the risk of exposure to Bitcoin’s price swings. However, analysts and market watchers remain divided over whether the move represents visionary leadership or a high-stakes gamble. GameStop’s foray into Bitcoin is reminiscent of Strategy’s pioneering move in August 2020, when the software company initiated its now-famous Bitcoin acquisition strategy. Strategy’s stock soared over the following years as the price of Bitcoin surged, but the company also faced criticism over its heavy exposure to a volatile and largely unregulated asset. GameStop’s pivot mirrors this strategy almost four years later but comes with key differences. While MicroStrategy’s move was led by CEO Michael Saylor’s personal conviction in Bitcoin as ”digital gold,” GameStop’s decision appears more corporate and tactical, likely aimed at leveraging its meme stock status and the interest of crypto-native retail investors. Bitcoin’s Role in Corporate Treasuries: Growing Trend or Risky Bet? GameStop’s move reignites the broader debate about whether corporations should allocate treasury reserves to Bitcoin. While Strategy and Tesla famously added Bitcoin to their balance sheets in the past, many publicly traded companies have remained cautious amid regulatory uncertainty and the inherent volatility of cryptocurrency markets. Still, GameStop’s announcement may encourage other companies with strong balance sheets and millennial-driven brand equity to follow suit, further blurring the lines between traditional corporations and digital asset ecosystems. GameStop has yet to disclose the specific details of its Bitcoin acquisition plan, including how much Bitcoin it intends to purchase and when those transactions will occur. Market participants will be watching closely in the coming weeks and months for SEC filings and company statements that could shed light on the scale and timing of its purchases. Tether Acquires 8,888 Bitcoin in Q1 2025, Expanding Holdings to Over $8.4 Billion Amid Regulatory Scrutiny Meanwhile, Tether, the issuer of the world’s largest stablecoin USDT, has significantly expanded its Bitcoin holdings in the first quarter of 2025, adding 8,888 BTC to its balance sheet, according to onchain data. The latest acquisition, valued at approximately $750 million at the time of writing, underlines Tether’s ongoing strategy of diversifying its reserves beyond traditional assets such as US Treasurys and cash equivalents. Blockchain analytics platform Arkham Intelligence tracked the movement of the Bitcoin purchase from a Bitfinex-associated address to a wallet controlled by Tether. This latest transaction brings the company’s total Bitcoin holdings to an impressive 100,521 BTC, currently valued at $8.46 billion. Bitcoin as a Strategic Reserve Asset Tether’s aggressive Bitcoin accumulation is part of its broader investment strategy to diversify reserve holdings and generate returns outside of conventional financial instruments. Since 2023, the company has been transparent about its intent to hold Bitcoin as part of its reserve portfolio, positioning the digital asset as a hedge against inflation and geopolitical risk. This latest purchase also arrives in the wake of regulatory discussions that could have significant implications for Tether’s Bitcoin reserves. In February, JPMorgan analysts suggested that pending US stablecoin legislation might require Tether to liquidate certain ”non-compliant” assets, including Bitcoin, precious metals, and secured loans, to meet new reserve standards. The report warned that under the proposed bills, Tether could be forced to divest its riskier holdings and replace them with cash or short-term US Treasurys to maintain its status as a compliant stablecoin issuer. Tether, however, was quick to dismiss the report’s conclusions. A spokesperson for the firm responded publicly, criticizing the analysts for lacking a fundamental understanding of both Tether and Bitcoin. The company emphasized that no stablecoin laws have yet been finalized in the US, and any assertions about forced divestment remain speculative at best. Tether’s Expanding Investment Empire Tether’s Bitcoin acquisitions are only one facet of the firm’s increasingly aggressive investment strategy. After posting $13 billion in profits in 2024, Tether has used its massive cash reserves to pursue high-profile and unconventional investments that extend far beyond cryptocurrency markets. The company has become the world’s seventh-largest buyer of US Treasurys, surpassing major economies such as Canada, Taiwan, and Mexico. Tether’s appetite for strategic investments has also reached mainstream sectors. In February 2025, Tether acquired a majority stake in Juventus FC, one of Italy’s top football clubs, in a landmark move that shook the sports and financial worlds. A month later, the firm invested €10 million ($10.8 million) in Italian media company Be Water, further embedding itself in Italy’s business landscape. Additionally, Tether has sought to acquire a controlling interest in South American agribusiness giant Adecoagro, signaling its ambitions to become a diversified financial powerhouse. Tether’s growing influence is also evident in its prior investments. Video platform Rumble, in which Tether invested $775 million in late 2024, recently launched a wallet feature supporting USDT payments for content creators — a development seen as a move toward greater stablecoin adoption in digital economies. Recent blockchain data also shows Tether minted an additional $1 billion worth of USDT on the Tron blockchain on March 31, indicating sustained demand for the stablecoin despite regulatory uncertainty and competitive pressures from emerging fiat-pegged tokens. Historically, large-scale USDT minting has often coincided with upward momentum in Bitcoin prices. Analysts suggest that the increased supply of stablecoins contributes to market liquidity and provides fresh capital inflows into the broader crypto ecosystem. David Pakman, managing partner at crypto investment firm CoinFund, recently forecasted that the global stablecoin supply could surge to $1 trillion by the end of 2025. If realized, this exponential growth could catalyze further adoption of digital assets, including Bitcoin, and enhance Tether’s role as a market heavyweight. The Regulatory Crossroads While Tether’s financial strength and growing investment footprint appear impressive, its Bitcoin strategy could face future challenges. The debate surrounding stablecoin regulation in the United States remains ongoing, and the eventual outcome could force structural adjustments in Tether’s reserve strategy. For now, Tether shows no signs of slowing down. Its Q1 Bitcoin purchase, combined with a diversified portfolio of investments in finance, sports, media, and technology, signals a clear intent to evolve beyond the realm of crypto markets and become an institutional player on the global financial stage.

title: Ripple Price Analysis: How Long Will XRP’s Consolidation Last?
body: XRP is holding above key support on both USD and BTC pairs but remains under pressure, with no strong bullish momentum in sight. Price action is consolidative and leaning slightly bearish in the short term. By Edris Derakhshi The USDT Paired Chart On the USDT pair, XRP is currently hovering above the $2 support zone after a series of lower highs following the rejection from the $3.00 resistance area. The asset has yet to make a higher high since mid-February and continues to face selling pressure on each attempt to rally. The 200-day moving average is rising steadily and currently sits well below the price near the $1.80 mark, acting as dynamic support for now. The RSI is also drifting near the 40–45 zone, suggesting weakening momentum without being fully oversold. If the buyers fail to defend the $2, the price may quickly slide toward the next demand around $1.50. On the other hand, to shift sentiment, XRP needs to reclaim $2.5 and close firmly above it. The BTC Paired Chart The XRP/BTC pair has been consolidating after a strong rally in November last year, with the price currently trading around 2,500 SAT. The pair has faced resistance near 3,000 SAT, which has led to the recent pullback. The 200-day moving average at approximately 2,000 SAT remains intact, indicating that, similar to the USDT pair, the broader uptrend is still in play. Yet, the RSI is trending lower, suggesting a potential weakening of momentum, but as long as XRP holds above 2,000 SAT, a bullish continuation above the 3,000 SAT area could be expected. The post Ripple Price Analysis: How Long Will XRP’s Consolidation Last? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: South Korean Investor Fined for Assaulting Delio CEO Over Lost Crypto
body: Investor Fined For Physically Attacking Delio CEO Over Crypto Losses A South Korean investor was fined for physically assaulting the CEO of collapsed crypto lender Delio after losing significant holdings in cryptocurrency. The assault is contributing to increasing fears of investor desperation as more collapses in the country’s digital asset sector continue. Investor Broke Into CEO’s Home Over Unanswered Fund Recovery Questions The perpetrator, who goes by Mr. A, is said to have lost 87 BTC and 190 ETH when Delio ceased operations in 2023. Frustrated with the silence, he went to see CEO Jeong Sang-ho at his home. An argument turned violent, and the police were called in. A summary fine of 1.5 million won ($1,023) for breaking and entering and assault was issued to Mr. A. While punished, he can still appeal the judgment in court. Historic Haru Invest CEO Attack Rekindles Worries The attack follows an earlier more violent incident against Haru Invest, in which investor Kang stabbed CEO Lee Hyung-soo during a hearing hearing. Kang, who lost 100 BTC, faces attempted murder charges. Prosecutors are asking for a 10-year prison term, while his attorneys opt for lesser charges over financial struggles. Authorities pursue unregistered exchanges, call for reform To appease mounting investor unrest, South Korean regulators are clamping down on unregistered crypto exchanges . The Financial Intelligence Unit has referred several major foreign platforms, including KuCoin and BitMEX, for violating local rules. Blocks and further sanctions are under consideration. Crypto’s Future in South Korea Remains Uncertain With investor anger simmering and large exchanges coming under charges of fraud, South Korea’s crypto space is in the spotlight. While regulators tighten fingers and courts weigh, both players in the business and investors wait for more certain direction in a more volatile marketplace.

title: Bitcoin Price Crashes 12% Despite Massive Corporate Buying In Q1—What’s Going On?
body: The post Bitcoin Price Crashes 12% Despite Massive Corporate Buying In Q1—What’s Going On? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Leading on-chain data provider CryptoQuant has revealed a shocking trend that public companies bought a massive 91,781 BTC in Q1 2025. Yet, despite this strong buying activity, Bitcoin’s price dropped from $94,400 to $82,500, a 12% decline. So, who’s buying? Why is Bitcoin falling? And what’s next for the market? Tether and MicroStrategy Lead the Buying Spree One of the most unexpected buyers this quarter was Tether, the company behind the world’s largest stablecoin, USDT. Tether added 8,888 BTC in Q1, bringing its total holdings to 92,646 BTC. While Tether’s involvement in Bitcoin is not new, this latest addition has raised eyebrows in the crypto space. Meanwhile, MicroStrategy , already known as the biggest corporate Bitcoin holder, continued its aggressive buying strategy. The company purchased 81,785 BTC in Q1, spending over $8 billion to increase its already massive Bitcoin holdings. Other companies also joined the trend: The Blockchain Company added 605 BTC. Semler Scientific increased its holdings by 1,108 BTC. Metaplanet bought 2,285 BTC. Who’s Planning to Buy Next? While these companies have already made huge purchases, CryptoQuant notes that others are preparing to buy more Bitcoin. Marathon Digital, a well-known Bitcoin mining firm, is planning a $2 billion stock sale to fund more BTC purchases. Similarly, GameStop has proposed a $1.3 billion convertible note offering, signaling its intent to incorporate Bitcoin into its strategy. If Companies Are Buying, Why Is Bitcoin Falling? Despite corporate buying, Bitcoin’s price still fell by 12% in Q1. CryptoQuant points to two key factors that may have driven the decline. Firstly, the long-term holders sold off a massive 178,000 BTC during the quarter, adding significant sell pressure that outweighed corporate purchases. Another major factor was the outflows from Bitcoin ETFs. In Q1, around $4.8 billion flowed out of Bitcoin ETFs, adding even more downward pressure on the market. CryptoQuant Suggestion CryptoQuant’s analysis suggests that only if this selling slows down, Bitcoin could see a strong recovery. With more companies planning big purchases, the market could soon turn bullish again.

title: Google Warns UK Crypto Firms of North Korea-Linked Fraudsters
body: According to Google’s Threat Intelligence Group (GTIG) , North Korea-linked tech operatives are broadening their infiltration of global blockchain companies, with a noticeable shift toward targeting firms in the United Kingdom and Europe. The move follows heightened scrutiny from U.S. authorities, which has pushed many of these actors to seek employment beyond American borders. These operatives disguise themselves as legitimate remote workers, securing employment within firms handling sensitive blockchain and artificial intelligence projects. The Google report highlights these operatives’ evolving tactics, including the expansion of a sophisticated global network of fake identities, new extortion strategies, and exploitation of corporate bring-your-own-device (BYOD) policies to evade detection. North Korea-Linked IT Fraudsters Build Global Network of Fake Identities, Says Google Google’s Threat Intelligence Group (GTIG) has uncovered an extensive web of fraudulent identities used by North Korean IT workers to secure employment in companies across Europe, particularly in the UK. Jamie Collier, a GTIG adviser, emphasized that these IT workers have evolved their operations in response to growing awareness in the U.S., pivoting toward European markets where scrutiny remains lower. “In response to heightened awareness of the threat within the United States, they’ve established a global ecosystem of fraudulent personas to enhance operational agility,” Collier noted. The report outlines how North Korean operatives pose as professionals from various countries, including Italy, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Ukraine, the U.S., and Vietnam. List of countries impacted by DPRK IT workers. Source: Google Many leverage fake credentials and references to gain access to companies handling cutting-edge blockchain and AI projects. Some of the identified activities include developing blockchain-based platforms using technologies such as Solana, Anchor, Cosmos SDK, and Rust. Another activity is the creation of a job marketplace utilizing the MERN stack and Solana. Collier further warned that the presence of enablers within the UK suggests the formation of a broader support network, enabling these operatives to persist in their schemes. Report Reveals Surge in Extortion Threats by Dismissed Workers Since October The GTIG report highlights a troubling rise in extortion tactics by dismissed North Korean IT workers. Since October, these workers have increasingly resorted to threatening former employers with data leaks, seeking to sell proprietary information to competitors or expose internal project details unless paid off. “In these incidents, recently fired IT workers threatened to release their former employers’ sensitive data or to provide it to a competitor,” the report states. This data often includes proprietary code and critical company intelligence. This escalation coincides with intensified U.S. law enforcement actions, including indictments and disruptions targeting North Korean operatives. The U.S. Department of Justice recently indicted two North Korean nationals for orchestrating a fraudulent IT employment scheme that involved more than 60 companies. The U.S. Treasury has also sanctioned entities accused of operating as front companies for North Korean IT activities. These operatives’ tactics have expanded beyond mere infiltration. Previously, when IT workers were dismissed, they would attempt to re-enter companies under different identities. However, recent firings have resulted in outright extortion, indicating a shift toward more aggressive financial exploitation strategies. In a related move, Google UK has recently introduced stricter policies on crypto-related advertisements to combat fraudulent activities. @Google has announced a policy update requiring advertisements for digital asset exchanges and wallets in the UK to register with the FCA. #Google #Crypto https://t.co/MwvQojg8vE — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) December 21, 2024 Starting January 15, 2025, all digital asset exchanges and wallet providers seeking to advertise in the UK must register with the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA). The UK’s FCA has been actively clamping down on misleading crypto promotions. These regulatory actions align with broader global trends, where authorities have mandated pre-approval for crypto-related advertisements. With cyber threats intensifying and regulatory oversight increasing, UK-based crypto firms must remain vigilant to protect their businesses from both external and internal risks. The post Google Warns UK Crypto Firms of North Korea-Linked Fraudsters appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: What’s Next for ETH After 10% Weekly Decline? Ethereum Price Analysis
body: Ethereum is attempting a recovery after bouncing from the $1,800 zone, but the price remains trapped below key resistance, and the broader trend is still bearish. Short-term momentum has improved slightly, but upside continuation remains uncertain. Technical Analysis By Edris Derakhshi The Daily Chart The daily chart shows ETH stabilizing around the $1,900 area following a sharp rejection from the $2,200 zone in late March. The asset remains well below the 200-day moving average, which continues to slope downward around the $2,800 region, confirming bearish market structure on a macro level. The most recent bounce has taken the price back into the $1,900 resistance zone, but the buyers are yet to show strong follow-through. The RSI is also rebounding from oversold levels, suggesting short-term relief, but there is no bullish divergence or momentum breakout to support a sustainable trend reversal. A decisive daily close above $1,950–$2,000 would be the first signal that buyers are regaining control. The 4-Hour Chart On the 4-hour timeframe, ETH is trading within a horizontal consolidation pattern, with the lower boundary at $1,800 and the higher one near the $2,200 region. After the recent sell-off, the price rebounded into the $1,900 supply zone but faced immediate resistance and is now pulling back slightly. Moreover, RSI hit near-overbought conditions during the bounce and is now cooling off, indicating potential consolidation or another retest of the $1,800 area. If ETH fails to break out above the higher boundary of the pattern, another leg down to sweep the $1,780–$1,750 liquidity becomes more likely. A confirmed breakout above $2,200, however, would invalidate the pattern and suggest a short-term bullish reversal. Sentiment Analysis By Edris Derakhshi (TradingRage) Exchange Reserve Ethereum’s exchange reserve has continued its multi-month downtrend, now reaching a new low of around 18.3M ETH held on trading platforms. This persistent decline suggests long-term holders and institutions are moving assets into cold storage or staking, reducing immediate sell pressure. Despite the bearish price action, the supply on exchanges is not increasing, which historically has acted as a bullish divergence when accompanied by reversal structures. The low reserves may act as a supply constraint once demand re-emerges, but for now, the lack of bullish momentum means this on-chain trend is supportive, not decisive. The post What’s Next for ETH After 10% Weekly Decline? Ethereum Price Analysis appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Ethena gears up for massive token unlock – can ENA price withstand the sell pressure?
body: Ethena is facing a potential wave of sell pressure as 266 million ENA tokens are set to unlock in two phases, starting with the first $34 million unlock today. According to CryptoRank.io , Ethena ( ENA ) will unlock 94.19 million ENA tokens today, worth $33.87 million—0.63% of total supply and 1.79% of market cap. Further, 171.85 million tokens will be unlocked on April 5. Source: CryptoRank.io The upcoming token unlocks come as ENA trades at $0.35, down by 17% over the past week, following World Liberty Financial ‘s dump of 184,000 ENA tokes, worth $69,000, on March 25. Prior to that, on March 5, Ethena unlocked a massive 2.07 billion ENA tokens—worth $728 million—representing 13.9% of the total supply. You might also like: How will ENA token prices move? Ethena to unlock $728M on Mar. 5 Looking at the chart, ENA price has been in a clear downtrend from the start of the year, trading below the 21-day Exponential Moving Average. The price attempted a breakout above the 21-day EMA for a few days in late March, but failed to sustain above it. The RSI is at 44.26, below the neutral 50 level. However, the RSI moving average is at 46.88, meaning there is some attempt to recover, but it’s still weak. The recent lows around $0.342 act as short-term support. If the price holds above this zone, it could attempt another move towards the 21-EMA at 0.3817. According to technical analyst Ali Martinez , if ENA defends this support level, it could climb to $0.473. As long as #Ethena $ENA defends the $0.342 support, it could climb toward $0.473. Keep it on your radar! pic.twitter.com/FKUFIpHBjr — Ali (@ali_charts) April 1, 2025 However, if this support fails, the price could drop to $0.30 – $0.32, where the price consolidated in October last year before breaking out into a major bullish rally . title: Introducing chart trading on Kraken Desktop
body: When seconds can mean the difference between profit and loss, you need a trading platform that does more than just execute orders. Kraken Desktop (available on Windows, Mac and Linux) answers that call. This sleek, customizable app brings the possibility of 1,200+ markets to your desktop computer. Among its new, standout features is chart trading, a game-changer for anyone who wants total control over their trades without juggling multiple windows or clunky interfaces. Explore chart trading on Kraken Desktop Why chart trading matters Chart trading isn’t just a convenience — it’s a tactical advantage. Here’s what sets it apart: Real-time visualization: See your orders plotted right alongside live price movements, helping you quickly spot opportunities and align your strategy with market trends. Speed and efficiency: Place or adjust orders directly on the chart in a single click. No need to switch between tabs, so you can react faster in volatile markets. Streamlined workflow : Manage complex strategies like bracket orders (combining stop loss and take profit) in one intuitive trade. Precision trading: Set exact price levels for market, limit, stop loss, take profit or bracket orders — and simply drag them to adjust. For professional traders, these capabilities translate into faster decisions, tighter execution and a clearer market view — all essential in the fast-paced world of crypto. How to use chart trading on Kraken Desktop To place an order, click on the button (on the chart axis) at your desired price level. Then choose from: Market orders: Execute instantly at current market price, only available on the price line Limit orders: Set your specific price for buys or sells Stop loss: Protect yourself by triggering a sale if the price moves to a certain level Take profit: Lock in gains at your execution target price Trailing stop: Employ a dynamic stop order that moves in tandem with price action Bracket orders: Combine an entry with both a stop loss (SL) and take profit (TP) orders. We set the quantity and trigger conditions, you just drag and drop. Built for every trader With the addition of chart trading, Kraken Desktop now support 3 methods to place a trade: Order tickets: Either in standard or active trading mode Ladder trading : With shortcuts for scaled or auto-join orders Chart trading: Orders placed and visualized directly on your chart However you trade, @KrakenDesktop is built for it https://t.co/HRfycjMVOg — Kraken Exchange (@krakenfx) March 20, 2025 Kraken Desktop puts unparalleled analytical and trade execution power right at your fingertips. title: Justin Sun becomes latest crypto mogul to join Forbes’ Billionaires List
body: Justin Sun becomes the newest crypto magnate added to the Forbes list of the world’s billionaires. Meanwhile, CZ retains his place as the richest crypto billionaire. According to Forbes World’s Billionaires List 2025, Justin Sun has a net worth of $8.5 billion, earning him a spot at number 353. The Tron ( TRX ) founder recently entered the list this year, even though Arkham Intelligence estimated Justin Sun’s net worth to be around $1.4 billion as of January 2024. With the latest inclusion of Justin Sun, there are a total of sixteen crypto magnates on the list who have managed to accumulate a combined net of more than $164 billion. Former Binance CEO Changpeng “ CZ ” Zhao has maintained his place as the richest cryptocurrency mogul on the Forbes’ list. In 24th place, CZ’s net worth nearly doubled from $33 billion to $62.9 billion in the span of a year, even after paying fines and spending four months behind bars. After stepping down from his role as Binance CEO, CZ is currently head of YZi Labs, formerly known as Binance Labs. The second richest crypto figurehead is Giancarlo Devasini, the Chief Financial Officer of stablecoin issuing firm Tether ( USDT ). In 90th place with a net worth of around $22.4 billion, Devasini is stated to be the biggest shareholder of Tether. In fact, four out of the 16 crypto figures on the list of billionaires came from stablecoin giant Tether. Aside from Devasini, there’s also former CEO, Jean-Louis van der Velde, current CEO Paolo Ardoino, and General Counsel of Tether, Stuart Hoegne. You might also like: Justin Sun eats $6.2m dollar Cattelan banana art work in Hong Kong event Gemini co-founders and identical twins, Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss tie in 1141st place with a net worth of $3.2 billion each. The Winklevoss twins founded the cryptocurrency exchange Gemini in 2014, which currently processes $30 million worth of crypto transactions per day. Coinbase ( BASE ) co-founders Brian Armstrong and Fred Ehrsam also made it into the billionaires list. Armstrong ranks in 311th place with a net worth of $9.2 billion, while Ehrsam is in 1362nd place with a net worth of $2.7 billion. Chairman of Strategy , Michael Saylor has seen his net worth increase by $3 billion compared to last year, bringing him to 430th place. Saylor’s net worth is reportedly worth around $7.4 billion. Formerly called MicroStrategy, the software company rebranded to Strategy in February this year. At press time, Strategy is the largest corporate holder of Bitcoin ( BTC ), owning 528,185 BTC worth around $45 billion. Other major names from the crypto space that are included on the list include Ripple ( XRP ) co-founder Chris Larsen, Stellar’s ( XLM ) Jed McCaleb, venture capitalist Tim Draper, CEO of Galaxy Digital Holdings Mike Novogratz and Bloq chairman Matthew Roszak. Read more: Changpeng Zhao tops crypto billionaires ranking despite legal saga

title: Will GameStop Bitcoin Strategy Pay? A Deep Dive Into Its $1.5B Fundraising
body: GameStop is making news again, only that this time, it has nothing to do with meme stocks. The gaming retailer is making a bold move into Bitcoin, after successfully raising $1.5 billion through a convertible note offering. This action has ignited debates in the cryptocurrency market, and the financial sector. The question at hand is whether what Gamestop is making is just a visionary bet, or a high-risk gamble that will soon backfire. This article delves deeper into Gamestop’s strategy, its potential impact on the company and Bitcoin, and whether this move could pay off. GameStop’s $1.5 Billion Fundraising: What You Need to Know GameStop recently issued convertible senior notes worth $1.5 billion to raise capital. Convertible notes allow investors to convert debt into equity, which means it is essentially taking on debt with the option of turning it into shares later. Why Raise $1.5 Billion? GameStop has been looking for methods to transform itself following the meme stock boom during the pandemic. Inspite of attempts to shift towards e-commerce and digital assets, the company has faced challenges in achieving profitability. This capital infusion provides the gaming retailer with the financial ability to consider new strategies, such as investing in Bitcoin. Initially, the gaming company had announced that it planned to secure a minimum of $1.3 billion through its convertible senior notes offering, but investor demand led to the purchase of an additional $200 million in principal amount, bringing the total to $1.5 billion, as detailed in the company’s April 1, 2025, filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission . GameStop’s Cryptocurrency Gamble: What’s the Strategy? GameStop announced that it plans to use some of its raised funds to buy Bitcoin for its reserve treasury , following in the footsteps of companies like MicroStrategy and Tesla. This marks a big shift from its usual gaming business to a wider investment approach. Potential benefits of buying Bitcoin include: Hedge against inflation: Many see Bitcoin as digital gold offering protection from currency devaluation. Drawing in crypto-savvy investors: GameStop has a large base of retail investors who are bullish on cryptocurrency. Long-term value growth : If Bitcoin’s price goes up, it could boost GameStop’s financial position. However, Bitcoin’s price swings make this a strategy with high risks and high rewards. How Does This Affect GameStop and Its Stock Price? Short-Term Market Reaction: GME stock surged following the announcement, as investors speculated on the company’s new direction. Some analysts have expressed skepticism, arguing that using debt to buy Bitcoin is a risky move. Bitcoin’s price also saw an uptick, possibly due to increased institutional confidence. Long-Term Implications: If Bitcoin’s value rises, GameStop’s balance sheet could benefit significantly. On the other hand, if Bitcoin crashes, the company could face major losses, impacting investor confidence. To manage the situtaation, GameStop could integrate crypto payments, NFTs, or blockchain-based gaming strategies to align with its Bitcoin holdings. Will GameStop’s Bitcoin Move Pay Off? Gamestops bold strategy is commendable, however, its success depends on how effectively it can integrate crypto into its business model, as well as the long-term performance of Bitcoin. Possible Scenarios: Best-case scenario : In case Bitcoin price increases, the gaming retailer’s investment will grow, boosting its financial health. Worst-case scenario: This is a case whereby GameStop could face challenges in managing its debts, and the value of Bitcoin drops. Middle ground: The company maintains Bitcoin as a long-term asset but doesn’t fully capitalize on it for business innovation. Conclusion GameStop’s choice to buy Bitcoin signals a key turning point for the company and the wider crypto world. This move comes with big risks, but it could also pay off well if Bitcoin’s value keeps going up. People who invest should watch how the company handles this change. They’ll want to see if its Bitcoin plan leads to gains over time—or if it adds another unpredictable chapter to its story. The post Will GameStop Bitcoin Strategy Pay? A Deep Dive Into Its $1.5B Fundraising appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Shocking Forex Forecast: UBS Predicts EUR/USD Drop to 1.07 & Unveils Swedish Krona Strength Potential
body: In the fast-paced world of Forex trading, staying ahead of the curve is paramount. Major financial institutions like UBS provide crucial insights that can shape your trading strategies. Recently, UBS released its latest Forex forecast, sending ripples through the market with a significant EUR/USD target for Q2 and an optimistic outlook on the Swedish Krona (SEK). Let’s dive into the details of this potentially game-changing Forex forecast and understand what it could mean for traders and the broader currency landscape. What’s Behind UBS’s EUR/USD Forex Forecast? UBS has set a EUR/USD target of 1.07 for the second quarter of the year. This target suggests a potential weakening of the Euro against the US Dollar. But what factors are driving this prediction? Several elements could be at play: Interest Rate Differentials: The monetary policy stances of the European Central Bank (ECB) and the Federal Reserve (Fed) play a critical role. If the Fed maintains a hawkish stance with higher interest rates compared to the ECB, it typically strengthens the US Dollar, potentially pushing EUR/USD lower. Economic Growth Divergence: The relative economic performance of the Eurozone and the United States is another key determinant. If the US economy shows stronger growth momentum than the Eurozone, investors may favor the US Dollar, leading to a decline in EUR/USD . Geopolitical Factors: Global events and geopolitical tensions can significantly impact currency valuations. Uncertainty in Europe, coupled with relative stability in the US, can also contribute to Euro weakness against the Dollar. Safe-Haven Demand: In times of global economic uncertainty, the US Dollar is often considered a safe-haven asset. Increased demand for safe-haven currencies can further bolster the Dollar and pressure EUR/USD downwards. To better understand the context, let’s consider a simplified table comparing potential factors influencing EUR/USD: Factor Potential Impact on EUR/USD if Positive for USD Potential Impact on EUR/USD if Positive for EUR US Interest Rates Downward Pressure Upward Pressure (if EUR rates rise more) US Economic Growth Downward Pressure Upward Pressure (if Eurozone growth outperforms) Geopolitical Stability (US vs. Eurozone) Downward Pressure (if US more stable) Upward Pressure (if Eurozone becomes more stable) Safe-Haven Flows Downward Pressure Upward Pressure (Less likely for EUR in global crises) The Potential for Swedish Krona (SEK) Strength Interestingly, alongside the EUR/USD forecast, UBS also highlights the potential for Swedish Krona (SEK) strength. This might seem counterintuitive at first glance, especially when considering global economic uncertainties. However, several factors could support a stronger SEK: Riksbank’s Monetary Policy: The Swedish central bank, Riksbank, has been actively combating inflation. If the Riksbank continues its hawkish stance, potentially through further interest rate hikes, it could attract foreign investment and strengthen the Swedish Krona . Strong Swedish Economy Fundamentals: Sweden boasts a robust and diversified economy. Solid export performance, technological innovation, and prudent fiscal management can contribute to investor confidence in the SEK. Lower Inflation Compared to Eurozone: If Sweden manages to keep inflation under better control compared to the Eurozone, it could make SEK relatively more attractive. This is because lower inflation erodes the value of a currency less over time. Geopolitical Positioning: Sweden’s perceived neutrality and stability in a volatile geopolitical landscape can also act as a draw for investors seeking safer currencies, potentially benefiting the Swedish Krona . Actionable Insights: Trading Implications of UBS’s Forecast So, how can traders leverage this Forex forecast from UBS? Here are some actionable insights: Monitor EUR/USD Closely: Keep a close watch on the EUR/USD pair, particularly as we move into Q2. Pay attention to economic data releases from both the Eurozone and the US, as well as statements from the ECB and Fed. Consider Short EUR/USD Positions: If you align with UBS’s view, you might consider opening or increasing short positions on EUR/USD , targeting the 1.07 level. However, always manage your risk appropriately with stop-loss orders. Explore Opportunities in SEK Pairs: The potential for Swedish Krona strength suggests opportunities in pairs like USD/SEK (potential for downside) or EUR/SEK (potential for downside). Conduct thorough analysis before trading SEK pairs, as they may have different volatility characteristics compared to major pairs like EUR/USD . Diversify Your Forex Strategies: While forecasts are valuable, it’s crucial to diversify your trading strategies. Don’t rely solely on one institution’s outlook. Combine UBS’s insights with your own technical and fundamental analysis. Stay Informed on Global Events: Geopolitical developments and unexpected economic shifts can rapidly alter currency valuations. Stay informed about global news that could impact the Forex forecast and adjust your strategy accordingly. Challenges and Risks to Consider It’s important to remember that any Forex forecast , including UBS’s, is not a guarantee. Currency markets are inherently volatile and influenced by a multitude of factors, many of which are unpredictable. Here are some challenges and risks to keep in mind: Forecast Accuracy: Economic forecasts are subject to error. Unexpected events, policy changes, or shifts in market sentiment can invalidate even the most well-researched predictions. Market Volatility: The Forex market is known for its volatility. EUR/USD and SEK pairs can experience sharp and sudden movements, especially during periods of economic uncertainty or major news releases. Execution Risk: Even if a forecast proves accurate, successfully executing trades to profit from it requires careful timing and risk management. Slippage and unexpected market gaps can impact trading outcomes. Black Swan Events: Unforeseen ‘black swan’ events – rare, high-impact occurrences – can completely disrupt market expectations and render existing forecasts irrelevant. Conclusion: Navigating the Forex Landscape with Informed Insights UBS’s Forex forecast provides valuable insights into potential movements in EUR/USD and the Swedish Krona . While suggesting a possible dip for EUR/USD to 1.07 and highlighting SEK strength, it’s crucial to approach this information with a balanced perspective. Use these insights to inform your trading decisions, but always conduct your own due diligence, manage risk effectively, and stay adaptable to the ever-changing dynamics of the Forex market. By combining expert analysis with your own market understanding, you can navigate the Forex landscape with greater confidence and potentially capitalize on emerging opportunities. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping currency valuations and trading strategies.

title: Crypto Price Analysis For April: Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Solana, BNB, Dogecoin, Rollblock and Cardano
body: April is shaping up to be an eventful month for crypto investors as Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Solana, BNB, Dogecoin, Rollblock, and Cardano finally look ready to break out of their trading ranges. These tokens are all looking primed for a potentially explosive month as savvy traders scan the charts for the next big move. With encouraging chart patterns emerging on multiple timeframes, the coming weeks could set the tone for the rest of 2025. Especially bullish right now is the up-and-coming GambleFi project Rollblock , which has been capturing massive attention with the kind of momentum and Web3 innovation that could drive a 50x rally this year. Here’s why… Rollblock (RBLK): Record-Breaking Growth and a GambleFi Surge Rollblock ( RBLK ) is out to revolutionize the online gaming industry and is quickly becoming the project that everyone else will chase once it hits the mainstream. With over $11.1 million in presale inflows already and record-breaking growth in new user signups and wagered bids month after month, the platform is hitting a real stride in 2025. At the heart of Rollblock’s innovative ecosystem are 8000+ highly immersive, AI-powered games including live roulette, Monopoly, and a sports prediction league that covers thousands of real-time matches across all international sports. It’s all secured on Ethereum, delivering real blockchain transparency to a $500 billion industry that is sorely in need of a revamp after decades of manipulation and lost trust. Recently, fiat payment options via Apple Pay, Google Pay, Visa, and Mastercard are opening the door to a massive new wave of players. The project’s Gaming Anjouan license and audit by Solid Proof have given it undeniable legitimacy, and the recent rise in mobile-first GameFi adoption is playing straight into Rollblock’s hands. With the recent buzz around the Burn Dashboard preview, tokenomics are front and center too. RBLK Supply Trending Lower Long Term Rollblock’s revenue-sharing system is designed to reward holders while constantly reducing the token’s supply. Each month, 30% of Rollblock’s revenue is used to buy back RBLK – 60% of those purchased tokens are then burned, reducing the overall supply, while 40% is used to fund industry leading staking rewards of up to 30% APY. With Stage 10 of the presale already over 53% sold at $0.062, and major exchange listings coming soon, this has to be one of the most promising entries in all of Web3. Explore Crypto Nautic’s full video review here: https://youtu.be/vF8vIHIvjfE?si=uQsATqLU1fCmYW6b Bitcoin (BTC): Approaching Key Resistance at $84.6k Bitcoin is up by 4% today to reach $85.2k. According to BB Crypto , “Bitcoin can test the area of $8610-$86600 again 📈.” This aligns with today’s price movement, where support around $81,000 has held strong and daily candle closes are now crucial to maintain short-term momentum. If the bulls push past resistance, Bitcoin could soon head into price discovery again. If bulls break through $85,600, Bitcoin could make a run toward $88,000 in April. Price movement will hinge largely on ETF inflows, and whether daily candle closes remain strong above support. Ethereum (ETH): Gains 4% As Gas Fees Tumble Ethereum is trading at $1,910 today, holding steady and up 4% despite recent market volatility around the threat of a global trade war. As CoinGape Daily pointed out, “Ethereum fees are at their lowest since 2020… and no one is talking about it?” That stat might reflect low demand for Ethereum right now, but it also sets the stage for future activity to come roaring back on the network, especially if Ethereum’s role in the wider DeFi economy continues to grow. If gas fees stay low while activity picks up across layer 2s, Ethereum could target $2,500 this April. XRP: Support Tested Once Again XRP is currently up 3% today to hit $2.15, consolidating here after multiple retests of a key support level at $2. WiseCharts called this level for some time, posting today, “It’s going to be many times that we’ve tested this support, I’ve shared it multiple times.” While some traders may see this as weakness, strong support is also a sign of resilience and if XRP breaks out from here in April, it could be a launchpad that will send it all the way past resistance. If XRP finds strength in the weeks ahead and breaks above $2.50, a run back toward $3.00 is possible this month. The key will be whether XRP buying volume returns on the next retest. Solana (SOL): Downtrend Remains After Major Rejection Solana is up by 2% to reach $129 today. Solana has had a tough time recently and has lost 9% of its market cap in the last month of trading. According to Trader Emma, “The SOL/USD 4-hour chart on Binance indicates a downtrend… After a brief consolidation phase between 137 and 151, the price faced rejection at 137.88.” With take-profit levels now around $132, Solana bears still appear to be in control, and it will take strong bullish volume to reverse course in the coming days. A break above $130 could send Solana toward $150 in April, but only if market sentiment shifts and traders return to the chain. Solana’s next move also depends on trading volume recovering from the current slump, which has been in freefall ever since the recent fallout from the Libra token launch. BNB: At A Crossroads And Looking for Direction BNB is trading around $612 today, having pumped by 3.6% in the last 24 hours on strong volume. If BNB can break above $625 with bullish momentum, it may retest the $650 level this April. The trend will depend heavily on the Binance exchange’s overall platform activity and wider market growth. Marcus Corvinus noted the crossroads that BNB holders find themselves in: “Volatility is heating up, and a slight bearish trend is in play. Will the bulls step in for a comeback, or is there more downside ahead?” With volatility heating up and bears gaining slight ground, it’s a critical time for BNB bulls to step in if the trend is to shift back up. Dogecoin (DOGE): Millionaire Wallets Disappearing DOGE is sitting at $0.17 after losing 5% this week amid months of steady declines. It looks as though Dogecoin whales have sold up and moved on to other ecosystems in recent weeks, as Crypto.Andy reported, “The number of DOGE millionaire addresses plunged by 41.37%… from 1,930 to 1,154,” showing a sharp reduction in the number of large Dogecoin holders. Confidence among OG Dogecoiners has clearly dipped, but this could also create more decentralized distribution among the meme community. If Dogecoin can reclaim $0.20 with support from retail investors and a tweet or two from Elon Musk, a move toward $0.35 is within reach this month. General sentiment on X and speculative demand for memes will be the biggest drivers here. Cardano (ADA): Climbing Toward a Breakout Cardano is trading at $0.68 today, after gaining 6% in an impressive relief rally. Amina_chattha underlined just how much potential lies with this promising layer 1 token if investors buy Cardano at these beaten down levels: “If you invest $100 in ADA at $0.60 and it climbs to $1.50, your investment could grow to $250…” The setup is simple, and Cardano’s chart looks ready for a breakout. With the Midnight privacy side chain nearing launch and momentum returning, Cardano could be one of the more bullish projects right now. If ADA can hold $0.60 as support and if volume continues to build, a breakout beyond $0.80 is possible in April. Rollblock Brings The Most Bullish Potential This Month April has only just begun but has already delivered promising price action for Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Solana, BNB, Dogecoin, Rollblock, and Cardano. These tokens are all incredibly bullish investments (if investors can stomach some volatility) but none is more compelling than Rollblock right now. With record-breaking recent growth, real revenue-sharing utility, and a fully-loaded GameFi platform, Rollblock remains the top pick for outsized gains in 2025. title: CURVE DAO PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (April 2) – CRV Resumes Bullish With H&S Pattern, Sees 9% Gains Daily
body: CRV resumed buying this week after witnessing a slight pullback last weekend. While its short-term bearish remains intact on the daily scale, it is footing an increase with an inverse head-and-shoulder pattern. The past month of trading has seen CRV through a temporal suspense in the short-term bearish as the price recovered steadily for three weeks. This brought a substantial increase and is now looking strong daily Meanwhile, looking at the latest setup, it appears to be forming H&S – an inverse head-and-shoulder pattern on the daily chart. This classical pattern indicates a potential reversal in the bearish trend. If the pattern comes into play, we can expect a new positive sentiment in the market. Currently, the market bias remains bearish on the short-term scale. An increase above last week’s high should bring a complete formation of the right shoulder before breaking out of the neckline. While this may signal a slight shift, we can anticipate a major rally once it reaches the top. In the opposite direction, the bulls may lose control if supply increases. Should that happen, the price may roll back to the recent low. A break from there may cause a catastrophic loss. But with the look of things, CRV appears set for a surge following over 10% recovery in a month. CRV’s Key Levels To Watch Source: Tradingview CRV currently eyes the $0.6 resistance level, tested last month. A surge above it should allow buying at $0.762, validating the bullish H&S pattern. Above this level lies the $0.92 resistance. The latest surge is currently supported by $0.445. A fall below it could roll the price back to $0.347, with a potential breakdown to $0.27. title: AI predicts XRP price for April 30, 2025
body: Despite XRP’s remarkable 315% rally over the past year, the token has now faded into uncertainty, as it struggles to maintain momentum in 2025. Once driven by hopes of regulatory clarity and renewed institutional interest, XRP has dropped 20% over the past month. A key catalyst came on March 19 for the digital asset, when Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse announced that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission had dropped its lawsuit over an alleged $1.3 billion unregistered securities offering. The announcement sparked a brief rally, with XRP climbing to $2.55. However, the token has since corrected by nearly 16.5%, slipping back to $2.12 at press time. XRP one-month price chart. Source: Finbold Finbold AI predicts XRP price target for April 30 As XRP struggles to break free from its current range, Finbold’s AI-powered prediction tool has provided an updated XRP forecast for the cryptocurrency’s performance for April 30, 2025. Based on technical indicators and market trends, the model now projects an average price target of $2, suggesting a flat projection from current levels and limited short-term upside. Finbold AI XRP price prediction. Source: Finbold Among the AI models, Claude 3.5 Sonnet offers a mildly optimistic view, projecting a move toward $2.15. The model highlights bullish signals, such as the 50-day simple moving average (SMA50) remaining above the 200-day average (SMA200). The large language model sees this as a sign of confidence, strengthened by regulatory progress and rising institutional interest. Conversely, GPT-4o maintains a conservative stance, predicting no price change (from the time of prediction) and holding firm at $2. The model points to a mixed technical picture, noting that while the SMA200 is trending upward signaling long-term strength the SMA50 is now turning downward, showing weakening short-term momentum. XRP market outlook Looking forward, XRP’s near-term direction will largely depend on the potential approval of a U.S. XRP-spot ETF , with 18 applications currently submitted to the SEC. A green light from regulators could open the door to significant institutional inflows, pushing XRP toward higher price targets. Global macroeconomic conditions including inflation data, central bank policies, and broader investor appetite for digital assets will also remain crucial. With supply-side factors creating additional headwinds , XRP’s ability to reclaim and sustain key price levels will be critical in determining whether it can break out of its current range or remain under pressure through April. Featured image via Shutterstock The post AI predicts XRP price for April 30, 2025 appeared first on Finbold .

title: Pi Network price nears all-time lows as supply pressure mounts
body: Social cryptocurrency project Pi Network’s price approaches all-time lows as more and more coins are unlocked. CoinMarketCap data shows that Pi Network (PI) is trading at $0.6722 as of press time, very close to its all-time low of $0.6152 reported on Feb. 20. The price action comes as over 126.6 million PI tokens are expected to be unlocked this month, equivalent to just under 1.87% of the coin’s current circulating supply. Monthly Pi unlock chart. Source: PiScan Founder of Obchakevich Research, Alex Obchakevich, attributed the price downturn to continued PI unlocks in correspondence with Cointelegraph. He described the event as “inevitable in any case” and said: “Monthly unlocks exceed demand, which greatly affects the value of the token.“ Related: The truth about Pi coin: Could it be the next Bitcoin? So far, the network has unlocked 4.9 billion PI, with 1.54 billion more coins being freed in the next 12 months. So far, Pi Network has unlocked an average of 133 million PI per month. The current downturn follows February's all-time lows following the Pi Network mainnet launch . The project operated with trading restrictions that prevented its listing on any platform until that point and then was listed on Bitget, OKX and MEXC. The potential is there Still, Obchakevich also recognized the potential of the Pi Network. He highlighted that the network should now “focus on project development now to increase usage and interest.” Talking about growth potential, he also said: “The project certainly has the potential to compete with the top 10 projects in the future. But now they need to stay on the market in such unstable times, as competitors offer more interesting conditions and products.“ Related: Pi Network mainnet launch: What it means for pioneers What is Pi Network? Pi Network is a mobile-first blockchain project allowing users to earn its native token, Pi coin, through an in-app daily check-in process. The network first launched in 2019 and is developed by a team of Stanford University graduates Pi Network employs a referral-based structure that sees users invite others to join in exchange for token earnings. In late February, Ben Zhou, the CEO of crypto exchange ByBit, challenged the project’s legitimacy and accused it of being a scam . He wrote at the time: “Yes, I still think you are a scam, and no, Bybit will not list scam.“ Magazine: Help! My parents are addicted to Pi Network crypto tapper

title: CME Crypto Derivatives Average Volume Hit Record $11.3B in Q1
body: CME Group (CME) saw record activity in its cryptocurrency derivatives markets during the first quarter of the year, driven by increased interest in micro-sized contracts. The company reported average daily volume of 198,000 contracts for crypto products, representing $11.3 billion in notional value. It pointed to record highs across its micro ether futures, with 76,000 contracts being traded, as well as its BTC and ETH futures contracts with a volume of 18,000 and 13,000 contracts, respectively. Trading in micro bitcoin futures also stood out with a 113% year-over-year increase, hitting 77,000 average daily volume (ADV).The company’s cryptocurrency contracts were already at a record back in January. The exchange’s bitcoin and ether futures contracts have a notional value of 5 BTC and 50 ETH, respectively, their micro contracts represent only 0.1 of each cryptocurrency. This smaller size enables more precise trading and risk management. The record-setting crypto activity came as part of broader momentum across the derivatives giant’s business. CME posted an all-time quarterly average daily volume of 29.8 million contracts in the first quarter, with records also set in U.S. Treasury futures, energy options, and agricultural contracts.

title: EOS PRICE ANALYSIS & PREDICTION (April 2) – EOS Breaks Out Monthly Resistance With 40% Rally in a Week, Signals Bullish
body: Starting this week on a strong note, EOS posted significant gains and broke out of a crucial resistance level. This led to a serious massive explosion and is now looking strongly bullish on the daily chart. EOS has been on the bulls’ radar for the past three weeks now as volume flows back into the market. This came after mounting support at $0.435 in March but failed to overcome the $0.67 resistance after a bounce. It saw a rejection and consolidated for over a week. This led to a break out of a three-month falling resistance line before testing it as support. Yesterday, being the start of a new month, it flipped a crucial resistance level of $0.67 to a daily high of $0.82. This led to a significant shift in the daily structure and is now forming a double-bottom pattern on the weekly chart. Adjusting to the daily chart, it appears highly bullish as it posts double-digit gains today. A further surge in volatility could bring a significant recovery in the recent dip before considering a major shift in the trend. Right now, EOS appears to have found a bottom following the latest increase in the demand level. From the look of things, the trend is likely to shift completely if the bulls dominate throughout this month. There are currently no signs of the bears in the market. If they show up again, they must pull the price below last month’s low to gain control. As of now, the bulls are in charge. EOS’s Key Levels To Watch Source: Tradingview The latest surge was intercepted at $0.82 while EOS target $0.99. However, if it flips through these levels in the next surge, $1.25 and $1.5 are the next resistance levels to keep an eye on. Yesterday’s breakout resistance of $0.67 is now considered a support level for a pullback. Right below it lies the $0.545 and $0.435 levels – last month’s low.
